text: Hey there and welcome to module 5. In
this module, we're going to be showing
you how we can set up our game over
screen. This is going to be really
exciting as it's going to be the last
part of building our game. We're going
to be showing you how we can bring all
of those graphics in using UMG like we
did in the previous, but then linking
this up so it actually restarts the game
and we can play this time after time
after time. With this, we're not only
just bringing in those graphics, but
we're also showing you the logic and the
extra blueprint functionality that we're
going to need for us to be able to bring
the screen to life to how to actually
restart and reset a game. Really
important. And this is going to be used
on pretty much any kind of game that
you're going to be creating. It's going
to be a very quick and exciting module.
So, let's jump straight in. Move on to
the next video to continue your Unreal
Engine learning journey. As always, stay
awesome, keep creating.
